page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content:
Along the Barkham ride,a firm is building a new estate with almost 100 houses being built in the price range of 50-70 thousand pounds.Opposite this estate another building firm has just finished building another estate so the area has been develloped a good deal more.
Late last year the council decided to build a roundabout where Barkham ride met Finchamstead road. This was because there had been two accidents and the people going from Barkham ride onto Finchamstead road somtimes had to wait 10 minutes to get onto the road.It took quite a lot of time to get it finished but it has improved the traffic a great deal. Along Barkham ride there has been a spate of burglaries lately.
